title: Review the UI UX design of your website/app with feedback
description: PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE PLACING AN ORDER TO DISCUSS YOUR NEEDS. QUICK REPLIES! Hi everyone, For promoting your online brand identity, paying attention to your website/app design is crucial to stand out from the crowd. Having an attractive, clear, and user-friendly design will help you convert visitors into customers and engage them to grow your business. As a professional UI/UX designer with experience in numerous projects, I'm here to provide a comprehensive UI/UX audit, written review, and detailed feedback. I identify the issues and offer recommendations to optimize your interface and create a powerful user experience for the improvement of your website/app to achieve your goals. What will you get? In a PDF document, I will provide a detailed written review, annotated screenshots of your website/app UI UX design, and feedback and suggestions. (FOR 1 PAGE WEB/APP) The feedback includes: •	The ease or difficulty of finding key information •	Detail of any issues with the user flows (UX) and interface (UI) •	An analysis of how well the website/app is optimized in these fields: ✔  Design Strategy ✔  Navigation ✔  Clear structure & Page organization ✔  Images, colors, typography, layout ✔  The functionality ✔  Clear and relevant Content ✔  Conversion & Call-to-actions ✔ etc. I can also implement the action plan and design (or redesign) the UI/UX of your website/app based on my recommendations with Figma or XD. ⚠️ Please note: • The offer is for 1 page UI/UX review of your website/app. If you need more pages, please contact me before placing an order or check my add-ons. • This gig does not include any code or development. • Check out my profile to see my other services. Looking forward to working with you.

title: Design a custom website banner, header, hero image
description: BEFORE PLACING AN ORDER, PLEASE CONTACT ME TO DISCUSS YOUR NEEDS. I REPLY QUICKLY! I have worked as a voice-over artist for 10 years now , following a career in the film industry within the sound and music department - but it's in the vocal booth that I found my passion!  Whatever it is you're looking for to give your project that boost, from character roles to corporate reads, give me a shout to see how I can help.  Need it in a hurry?  No problem - I aim to turn projects around within a few hours of our scheduled recording slot!
